thread.title: A trip to the city
thread.title_full: A trip to the city - Review of BEST WESTERN Bowery Hanbee Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: D4622KScindyb
title: A trip to the city
text: A visit to NewYork was on our bucket list and was pleased to find a Best Western in the area. This was a great hotel! The free breakfast was fabulous every morning with many options. All of the staff was amazing! Several very good restaurants nearby were recommended by the staff and were fabulous. Short walk to Canal street for shopping and subway to downtown.we felt very welcome and safe during our entire stay. I would definitely recommend this hotel!
